/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly white and gray, punctuated by occasional splashes of red and green, adding a touch of vibrancy to the otherwise monochrome palette. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and buses navigating their way through the city's arteries. On the right side of the street, trees and bushes can be seen, offering a touch of nature amidst the concrete jungle. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
